exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables d, m, m.
In environment d : nat Unable to unify "mdiv 0 n_0 n_0" with "transitive (mon d) (mdiv d)".

exceptions.tactic: intros d0 v v' n n' H H0 IH.

exceptions.exn: In environment d : nat Unable to unify "mdiv (S ?M1390) (c_n ?M1390 ?M1393 ?M1391) (c_n ?M1390 ?M1394 ?M1392)" with "forall x y z : mon d, mdiv d x y -> mdiv d y z -> mdiv d x z".

original: intros d. apply mdiv_ind. - apply mdiv_nil. - intros d0 v v' n n' H H0 IH. apply mdiv_cons; try auto. apply IH.
